about_the_game:
The music of Mega Man, Mega Man X, Mega Man Legends, Mega Man Battle Network, Mega Man Star Force and more gets masterfully arranged for a second time by the rocking "ROCK-MEN" of the Capcom Sound Team! Imbue your ears with pulse-pounding waves of electronic rock!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
detailed_description:
The music of Mega Man, Mega Man X, Mega Man Legends, Mega Man Battle Network, Mega Man Star Force and more gets masterfully arranged for a second time by the rocking "ROCK-MEN" of the Capcom Sound Team! Imbue your ears with pulse-pounding waves of electronic rock!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).

name: We are ROCK-MEN! 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 239 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 382 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
